transcript: and the enemy's in- tention to kill him seemed impossible. "But perhaps they may do it!" For more than ten seconds he stood not moving from the spot or realizing the situation. The foremost French- man, the one with the hooked nose, was al- ready so close that the expression of his face could be seen.
